title: Book Illustration; Print, Fontaine des Arts (Fountain of the Arts) from Recueil de divers dessins de fontaines et de frises maritimes, 1684–87
title_raw: Fontaine des Arts (Fountain of the Arts) from Recueil de divers dessins de fontaines et de frises maritimes
description: An arched grotto with the Muses, seated above and below river gods, recline beneath veil of water at lower center.  At apex of the arch is the rearing winged horse Pegasus with water jetting behind him.  Water spouts, left and tight, center, emerge from the beaks of swans, held by winged amors; at lower left and lower tight, from the mouth of dragons.  Title in plate, lower center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Illustration; Print, Fontaine des Arts (Fountain of the Arts) from Recueil de divers dessins de fontaines et de frises maritimes, 1684–87. etching on paper. 
1947-28-37
